raw: Oil soars after Trump says Saudis and Russians to cut output .

raw: NEW YORK ( Reuters ) - Oil prices soared on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he expects Russia and Saudi Arabia to announce a major oil production cut , and Saudi state media said the kingdom was calling an emergency meeting of oil producers to deal with the market turmoil .

raw: Trump said he had spoken to Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman , and expects Saudi Arabia and Russia to cut oil output by as much as 10 million to 15 million barrels per day , as the two countries signaled willingness to make a deal .
replaced: Trump said Trump had spoken to Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman , and expects Saudi Arabia  Saudi Arabia and Russia  Russia to cut oil output by as much as 10 million to 15 million barrels per day , as Saudi Arabia and Russia signaled willingness to make a deal .

raw: Oil markets have been under pressure ever since early March , when Saudi Arabia and Russia were unable to come to terms on a deal to curb production , and the Saudis responded by boosting output to more than 12 million bpd and shipping out cargoes worldwide at discounted prices .
